overview: Foxy, a transexual singer has secrets. Don’t we all? Perhaps not like her. She was the creator behind ‘The Black Halos’, the most notorious motorcycle gang in America and faked her own death in order to escape the menacing gang.. But when she discovers her younger brother is caught up in the same mess she was, she goes undercover as her former self to protect her younger brother from her own creation.
title: The Blue Highway
